title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Corralling stray thoughts can be a lot like trying to herd cats today. With a special event or deadline looming ever nearer, you sense that the most headway can be made by concentrating on one priority at a time. But maintaining this mental focus is easier said than done when there is so much of interest going on around you. Have patience with your wandering mind and give your thoughts a chance to crystallize on their own volition. Like a feline, inspiration has an uncanny knack for finding its way home. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
